=== Items of Business ===

==== Administrative Stuff ====

===== Infrastructure =====

* Our Launchpad team page: https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-minnesota - official roster
* Mailing list: https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-mn - primary communication and announcements, ALL should be on this
* Forum: http://minnesota.ubuntuforums.org/ - support, discussion, and other threaded stuff
* IRC: #ubuntu-minnesota on Freenode - live chat
* Personal wiki pages: ie, https://wiki.ubuntu.com/TonyYarusso - include info about experience, skills, professional connections, things you have to offer
* Project page: https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-minnesota-projects - will use more in the future; feel free to explore

(Note: In all of those places, remember to follow the Ubuntu Code of Conduct, listed at http://www.ubuntu.com/community/conduct)
